A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They could have done so much more\, cause the storyline was thin\, but in spite of that it was a good movie\, in fact a real Star Wars movie. I have seen them all so many times since my first visit to the cinema 1977 and this is not the worst. I had a wonderful time and I am going to see it once more in 3D. May the force be with you\, always
